unnormalised: LaTeXant zageacho gol zoddtea tankam, \(A = \pi r^2\) hem sutra ugddas dovrat. Zori radius, \(r\), 5 cm mhunn dilear, zalear \(A = \pi (5\text{ cm})^2 = 25\pi \text{ cm}^2\). \(\pi \approx 3.14159\) hacho vapor korun lagichem andaz korunk, zago sumar \(78.54 \text{ cm}^2\) asta. Tumi tumchem svotachem commandui tharavunk zatat! Udharonnak, `\newcommand{\circleArea}[1]{\pi * (#1)^2}` vaprat mhunn `\circleArea{5}` tumkam pi chya rupant zobab dit. Chukinashtana yogya units vaprat (udharonnak, cm, m, mm).
normalised: L-A-T-E-Xant vrittaachem kshetrfal sodunk tras zata tankam, sutra A pi r varg mhunn ugddas dovrat. Zori trijya, r, panch sentimittar mhunn dilear, A pi panch sentimittar varg barabar ponchvis pi sentimittar varg zata. Pi chya kimti lagbhag tin point ek char ek panch no vaprun andazh kaddlear, kshetrfal lagbhag sattryashi point panch char sentimittar varg asta. Tumhi tumchi svotachi commandui tharauunk xakta! Udaharonnak, baekslash newcommand baekslash circle Area square bracket one curly bracket baekslash pi asterisk haish one squared curly bracket vaprat jeen baekslash circle Area panch dilear tumkam pi chya rupant zobab melltta. Yogya yunit vaprunk ugddas dovrat (udaharonnak, sentimittar, mittar, millimittar).
text: LaTeXant zageacho gol zoddtea tankam, \(A = \pi r^2\) hem sutra ugddas dovrat. Zori radius, \(r\), 5 cm mhunn dilear, zalear \(A = \pi (5\text{ cm})^2 = 25\pi \text{ cm}^2\). \(\pi \approx 3.14159\) hacho vapor korun lagichem andaz korunk, zago sumar \(78.54 \text{ cm}^2\) asta. Tumi tumchem svotachem commandui tharavunk zatat! Udharonnak, `\newcommand{\circleArea}[1]{\pi * (#1)^2}` vaprat mhunn `\circleArea{5}` tumkam pi chya rupant zobab dit. Chukinashtana yogya units vaprat (udharonnak, cm, m, mm).
